001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.loader;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
004import org.openqa.selenium.By;
005
006/**
007 * Represents a loader or spinner element in a UI, providing methods to check its visibility
008 * and to wait for it to appear or disappear.
009 *
010 * <p>Typical usage scenarios include verifying if a loader is displayed on the screen
011 * and waiting until it finishes loading (is removed). Implementations are expected
012 * to handle the actual waiting logic, using container or locator references, potentially
013 * with explicit or implicit waits.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017public interface Loader {
018
019   /**
020    * Checks if the loader is visible within the specified container.
021    *
022    * @param container a {@link SmartWebElement} representing the container holding the loader.
023    * @return true if the loader is visible, false otherwise.
024    */
025   boolean isVisible(SmartWebElement container);
026
027   /**
028    * Checks if the loader identified by the given locator is visible.
029    *
030    * @param loaderLocator a {@link By} locator used to find the loader element.
031    * @return true if the loader is visible, false otherwise.
032    */
033   boolean isVisible(By loaderLocator);
034
035   /**
036    * Waits for the loader in the specified container to become visible within a given timeout.
037    *
038    * @param container    the container element holding the loader.
039    * @param secondsShown the maximum number of seconds to wait for the loader to appear.
040    * @throws RuntimeException if the loader is not shown within the specified timeout.
041    */
042   void waitToBeShown(SmartWebElement container, int secondsShown);
043
044   /**
045    * Waits for a loader (implicitly identified) to become visible within a given timeout.
046    *
047    * @param secondsShown the maximum number of seconds to wait for the loader to appear.
048    * @throws RuntimeException if the loader is not shown within the specified timeout.
049    */
050   void waitToBeShown(int secondsShown);
051
052   /**
053    * Waits for the loader identified by the given locator to become visible within a given timeout.
054    *
055    * @param loaderLocator the {@link By} locator used to find the loader element.
056    * @param secondsShown  the maximum number of seconds to wait for the loader to appear.
057    * @throws RuntimeException if the loader is not shown within the specified timeout.
058    */
059   void waitToBeShown(By loaderLocator, int secondsShown);
060
061   /**
062    * Waits for the loader in the specified container to be removed within a given timeout.
063    *
064    * @param container      the container element holding the loader.
065    * @param secondsRemoved the maximum number of seconds to wait for the loader to disappear.
066    * @throws RuntimeException if the loader is not removed within the specified timeout.
067    */
068   void waitToBeRemoved(SmartWebElement container, int secondsRemoved);
069
070   /**
071    * Waits for a loader (implicitly identified) to be removed within a given timeout.
072    *
073    * @param secondsRemoved the maximum number of seconds to wait for the loader to disappear.
074    * @throws RuntimeException if the loader is not removed within the specified timeout.
075    */
076   void waitToBeRemoved(int secondsRemoved);
077
078   /**
079    * Waits for the loader identified by the given locator to be removed within a given timeout.
080    *
081    * @param loaderLocator  the {@link By} locator used to find the loader element.
082    * @param secondsRemoved the maximum number of seconds to wait for the loader to disappear.
083    * @throws RuntimeException if the loader is not removed within the specified timeout.
084    */
085   void waitToBeRemoved(By loaderLocator, int secondsRemoved);
086}
087
